quote: I’m just a soul whose intentions are good,’“ he sang to the crabs and the spiders and the palmetto beetles and the lizards and the night. ‘“Oh lord, please don’t let me be misunderstood.
quote_letters: IM JUST A SOUL WHOSE INTENTIONS ARE GOOD HE SANG TO THE CRABS AND THE SPIDERS AND THE PALMETTO BEETLES AND THE LIZARDS AND THE NIGHT OH LORD PLEASE DONT LET ME BE MISUNDERSTOOD
